Name: Ru-Yi Knot
Ingredients: 45 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, shake with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Special ingredient #1 : Homemade syrup with mint tea
History: The Chinese Bacardí Legacy 2013 winning cocktail created by Yao Zong "Foxyie" Huang at Bar The Soul in China.
